articles.title: Pound faces 'existential crisis', Bank of America warns – live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: The pound is facing an “existential crisis” and is likely to weaken further during this year, one of Wall Street’s top banks has warned.
articles.content:

articles.title: American comedian's racist remarks spark walkout at Winnipeg comedy show - CBC.ca
articles.description: A Ojibway woman says she was among at least 30 people who walked out of Rumor's Comedy Club in Winnipeg on Friday due to several racist and homophobic comments they heard from the stage.
articles.content:

articles.title: Spectacular New Tau Herculids Meteor Shower May Light Up the Skies Over North America - SciTechDaily
